evidence.claim: PracticeRx utilizes AWS services for hosting their applications and managing databases.
The platform ensures HIPAA compliance for secure patient data handling.
Integration with EHR systems supports interoperability using FHIR standards.
Use of RESTful APIs for data exchanges between systems is documented in their technical resources.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or clearinghouse services on their site.
